original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitam sahajīvinim na iva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam karoti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā dukkhitam sahajīvinim na iva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam karissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karotī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitam sahajīvinim na iva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam karoti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitam sahajīvinim na iva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam karissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitam sahajīvinim na iva upaṭṭheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam kareyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: “Neva upaṭṭhessāmi, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karissāmī”ti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: na iva upaṭṭhessāmi na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam karissāmi iti dhuram nikkhitta matte āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Antevāsiniṁ vā anupasampannaṁ vā neva upaṭṭheti, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: antevāsinim vā anupasampannam vā na iva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkam karoti āpatti dukkaṭassa
